title: Spaghetti Carbonara
author: Chef Mario Rossi
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with creamy egg sauce and pancetta.
longDescription: Spaghetti Carbonara is one of the most beloved Italian pasta dishes. Made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper, it's a simple yet rich and satisfying meal. This version uses fresh eggs and Parmigiano Reggiano for extra flavor.
steps: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat the eggs with grated parmesan.
Drain pasta and combine with pancetta.
Remove from heat and stir in egg mixture quickly.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and black pepper.

comments.comment: This was so creamy and delicious! Reminded me of my trip to Rome.
Easy to follow recipe, my family loved it!

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
author: Chef Sarah Lee
description: A nourishing bowl packed with quinoa, veggies, and tahini dressing.
longDescription: This vegan Buddha bowl is a colorful and balanced meal filled with protein, healthy fats, and fiber. Featuring quinoa, roasted chickpeas, fresh vegetables, and a creamy tahini dressing, it's both filling and refreshing.
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Roast chickpeas with olive oil and spices until crispy.
Slice avocado and halve cherry tomatoes.
Arrange spinach, quinoa, chickpeas, avocado, and tomatoes in a bowl.
Mix tahini with lemon juice and drizzle on top.

comments.comment: Perfect for meal prep! I made 3 bowls for the week.
Good but I added extra dressing for more flavor.
